Termitron/Nightlight/Windlord:

"Termitron, go where Technosis is..." said Nightlight and she told to 
Aerotaur and Perplex "I'll search Zeni, any idea where could he be?"

Termitron left the place and he lost in corritors. Nighlight changed 
to beast mode and she was almost ready to search Zeni.

"What?" said the hawk "Do you want that I stay here with Gramps?"


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>     "Perplex.  Have you been listening to the shots against the 
door?  I've 
> been hearing two different shots.  He may have brought backup.  You 
go first 
> it's your right to fight him but I'm staying behind you all the way.
